class.name: project.conf.resource.ormapper.dto.oracle.SysUser
class.meta: User Info - Use Excel file to initialise data (SYS_USER_1.xlsx, SYS_USER_2.xlsx)

hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT AUTH_GROUP_ID, USER_ID, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PASSWORD, IS_ACTIVE, LANGUAGE, MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE, PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE, PERSON_ID, THEME_TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_STATUS, USER_TYPE, DEFAULT_START_URL, DESCRIPTION, TO_CHAR(DISABLED_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS DISABLED_DATE, EMAIL, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_PORTAL_USER, PHOTO_PATH, PIN, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE, PORTAL_SKIN, PROP_TO_PORTAL, RESET_PASSWORD, RESET_TERM_CONDITION, SECURITY_QUESTION_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_2, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM SYS_USER WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE

INSERT INTO SYS_USER ( AUTH_GROUP_ID, USER_ID, LOGIN_ID, LOGIN_PASSWORD, IS_ACTIVE, LANGUAGE, MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE, PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE, PERSON_ID, THEME_TYPE, USER_NAME, USER_STATUS, USER_TYPE, DEFAULT_START_URL, DESCRIPTION, DISABLED_DATE, EMAIL, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, IS_PORTAL_USER, PHOTO_PATH, PIN, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE, PORTAL_SKIN, PROP_TO_PORTAL, RESET_PASSWORD, RESET_TERM_CONDITION, SECURITY_QUESTION_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_2, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${AUTH_GROUP_ID}, ${USER_ID}, ${LOGIN_ID}, ${LOGIN_PASSWORD}, ${IS_ACTIVE}, ${LANGUAGE}, ${MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE}, ${PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE}, ${PERSON_ID}, ${THEME_TYPE}, ${USER_NAME}, ${USER_STATUS}, ${USER_TYPE}, ${DEFAULT_START_URL}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${DISABLED_DATE}, ${EMAIL}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${IS_PORTAL_USER}, ${PHOTO_PATH}, ${PIN}, ${PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID}, ${PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE}, ${PORTAL_SKIN}, ${PROP_TO_PORTAL}, ${RESET_PASSWORD}, ${RESET_TERM_CONDITION}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_1}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_2}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1}, ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE SYS_USER SET AUTH_GROUP_ID = ${AUTH_GROUP_ID}, LOGIN_ID = ${LOGIN_ID}, LOGIN_PASSWORD = ${LOGIN_PASSWORD}, IS_ACTIVE = ${IS_ACTIVE}, LANGUAGE = ${LANGUAGE}, MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE = ${MAX_ROW_PER_PAGE}, PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE = ${PAGE_NUM_PER_PAGE}, PERSON_ID = ${PERSON_ID}, THEME_TYPE = ${THEME_TYPE}, USER_NAME = ${USER_NAME}, USER_STATUS = ${USER_STATUS}, USER_TYPE = ${USER_TYPE}, DEFAULT_START_URL = ${DEFAULT_START_URL}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, DISABLED_DATE = ${DISABLED_DATE}, EMAIL = ${EMAIL}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, IS_PORTAL_USER = ${IS_PORTAL_USER}, PHOTO_PATH = ${PHOTO_PATH}, PIN = ${PIN}, PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID = ${PORTAL_ORG_PROFILE_ID}, PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE = ${PORTAL_SECURITY_ROLE}, PORTAL_SKIN = ${PORTAL_SKIN}, PROP_TO_PORTAL = ${PROP_TO_PORTAL}, RESET_PASSWORD = ${RESET_PASSWORD}, RESET_TERM_CONDITION = ${RESET_TERM_CONDITION}, SECURITY_QUESTION_1 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_1}, SECURITY_QUESTION_2 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_2}, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_1}, SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2 = ${SECURITY_QUESTION_ANSWER_2}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
